Text:
WTF!!!!

What format is the files in? it don't fucking work!

It's in .avi...
Should work with WMP although if it doesn't, VCL is the way to go: http://www.videolan.org/vlc/

Get the k-lite mega codec pack (google), and you can watch almost any video files.

Thanks for the upload. Hope you will keep uploading new Family Guy episodes here.
